Drawable

HandleHoverEvents

Whether this input manager is in a state it should handle hover events. This could for instance be set to false when the window/target does not have input focus.

public virtual bool HandleHoverEvents { get; }

Property Value

bool

Host 

[Resolved(CanBeNull = true)]
protected GameHost Host { get; }

Property Value

GameHost

HoveredDrawables

Contains all hovered Drawables in top-down order up to the first which returned true in its OnHover(HoverEvent) method. Top-down in this case means reverse draw order, i.e. the front-most visible Drawable first, and Containers after their children.

public SlimReadOnlyListWrapper<Drawable> HoveredDrawables { get; }

Property Value

SlimReadOnlyListWrapper<Drawable>

InputHandlers 

protected abstract ImmutableArray<InputHandler> InputHandlers { get; }

Property Value

ImmutableArray<InputHandler>

MapMouseToLatestTouch

Whether to produce mouse input on any touch input from latest source.

protected virtual bool MapMouseToLatestTouch { get; }

Property Value

bool

NonPositionalInputQueue

Contains all Drawables in top-down order which are considered for non-positional input.

public SlimReadOnlyListWrapper<Drawable> NonPositionalInputQueue { get; }

Property Value

SlimReadOnlyListWrapper<Drawable>

Remarks

This collection should not be retained as a reference. The contents is not stable outside of local usage.

PositionalInputQueue

Contains all Drawables in top-down order which are considered for positional input. This list is the same as HoveredDrawables, only that the return value of OnHover(HoverEvent) is not taken into account.

public SlimReadOnlyListWrapper<Drawable> PositionalInputQueue { get; }

Property Value

SlimReadOnlyListWrapper<Drawable>

Remarks

This collection should not be retained as a reference. The contents is not stable outside of local usage.

Methods

ChangeFocus(Drawable)

Changes the currently-focused drawable. First checks that potentialFocusTarget is in a valid state to receive focus, then unfocuses the current FocusedDrawable and focuses potentialFocusTarget. potentialFocusTarget can be null to reset focus. If the given drawable is already focused, nothing happens and no events are fired.

[Obsolete("This method does not allow trapping focus. Use GetContainingFocusManager().ChangeFocus() instead.")]
public bool ChangeFocus(Drawable potentialFocusTarget)

Parameters

potentialFocusTarget Drawable

The drawable to become focused.

Returns

bool

True if the given drawable is now focused (or focus is dropped in the case of a null target).

ChangeFocus(Drawable, InputState)

Changes the currently-focused drawable. First checks that potentialFocusTarget is in a valid state to receive focus, then unfocuses the current FocusedDrawable and focuses potentialFocusTarget. potentialFocusTarget can be null to reset focus. If the given drawable is already focused, nothing happens and no events are fired.

protected bool ChangeFocus(Drawable potentialFocusTarget, InputState state)

Parameters

potentialFocusTarget Drawable

The drawable to become focused.

state InputState

The InputState associated with the focusing event.

Returns

bool

True if the given drawable is now focused (or focus is dropped in the case of a null target).

LoadComplete()

Invoked after this Drawable has finished loading.

protected override void LoadComplete()

Remarks

This method is invoked on the update thread inside this Drawable's UpdateSubTree().

PropagateBlockableEvent(SlimReadOnlyListWrapper<Drawable>, UIEvent)

Triggers events on drawables in drawables until it is handled.

protected virtual bool PropagateBlockableEvent(SlimReadOnlyListWrapper<Drawable> drawables, UIEvent e)

Parameters

drawables SlimReadOnlyListWrapper<Drawable>

The drawables in the queue.

e UIEvent

The event.

Returns

bool

Whether the event was handled.

Invoked to register dependency activation functions for this object.

public override void RegisterForDependencyActivation(IDependencyActivatorRegistry registry)

The IDependencyActivatorRegistry to register activation functions with.

TriggerFocusContention(Drawable)

Reset current focused drawable to the top-most drawable which is RequestsFocus.

[Obsolete("This method does not allow trapping focus. Use GetContainingFocusManager().TriggerFocusContention instead.")]
public void TriggerFocusContention(Drawable triggerSource)

Parameters

triggerSource Drawable

The source which triggered this event.

Update()

Performs a once-per-frame update specific to this Drawable. A more elegant alternative to OnUpdate when deriving from Drawable. Note, that this method is always called before Drawables further down the scene graph are updated.

protected override void Update()

Events

TouchLongPressBegan

Invoked when a touch long-press gesture has scheduled for triggering after the specified delay.

public event Action<Vector2, double> TouchLongPressBegan

Event Type

Action<Vector2, double>

TouchLongPressCancelled

Invoked when an ongoing touch long-press gesture has been cancelled.

public event Action TouchLongPressCancelled

Event Type
